last_episode_to_air.name: 7:01am
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Purge Night rages on, Esme, Ryan, Marcus and Ben fight for their lives and their loved ones.

name: The Purge
overview: Set in a dystopian America ruled by a totalitarian political party, the series follows several seemingly unrelated characters living in a small city. Tying them all together is a mysterious savior who’s impeccably equipped for everything the night throws at them. As the clock winds down with their fates hanging in the balance, each character is forced to reckon with their pasts as they discover how far they will go to survive the night.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: During a 12-hour period when all crime -- including murder -- is legal, a group of seemingly unrelated characters cross paths in a city in an altered America.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Season 2 explores how a single Purge night affects the lives of four interconnected characters over the course of the ensuing year, all inevitably leading up to the next Purge.

tagline: Surviving the night is just the beginning.

episodes.name: What Is America?
episodes.overview: Once a year, any and all crime -- including murder -- is legal in America for a period of 12 hours.

episodes.name: Take What's Yours
episodes.overview: Jane considers the morality of Purge while Miguel searches for Pete the Cop.

episodes.name: The Urge to Purge
episodes.overview: Penelope prepares for her sacrifice. Rick and Jenna weigh the cost of closing their business deal.

episodes.name: Release the Beast
episodes.overview: Jane must leave the office while Lila consoles Jenna. Penelope is thrust into the Carnival of Flesh.

episodes.name: Rise Up
episodes.overview: Catalina warns Jenna. Henry torments Penelope. Jane goes on a ride along with the Matron Saints.

episodes.name: The Forgotten
episodes.overview: Joe remembers the past while Miguel confronts Henry. Jane learns a dark truth about David Ryker.

episodes.name: Lovely Dark and Deep
episodes.overview: Miguel and Penelope hike the forest. Jane must endure David's party. Rick doubts Lila's intentions.

episodes.name: The Giving Time Is Here
episodes.overview: Lila grapples with rejection. Miguel and Penelope seek the safety of the Cantina.

episodes.name: I Will Participate
episodes.overview: Joe debates the Purge with Jane. Miguel teams up with Pete to rescue Penelope.

episodes.name: A Nation Reborn
episodes.overview: Penelope takes charge. Miguel and Pete grapple with an unexpected enemy.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: During a 12-hour period when all crime -- including murder -- is legal, a group of seemingly unrelated characters cross paths in a city in an altered America.

episodes.name: This Is Not a Test
episodes.overview: Four interconnected characters navigate the aftermath of the Purge over the ensuing year.

episodes.name: Everything Is Fine
episodes.overview: The city cleans up last night's Purge, but Ryan, Marcus, Esme and Ben can't shake its effects.

episodes.name: Blindspots
episodes.overview: The residual effects of the purge affect the lives of Ryan, Marcus, and Esme.

episodes.name: Grief Box
episodes.overview: Marcus confronts his past. Esme learns the truth. Ryan changes his plan. Ben seeks understanding.

episodes.name: House of Mirrors
episodes.overview: Ryan, Marcus, Esme and Ben learn that some lines can't be uncrossed.

episodes.name: Happy Holidays
episodes.overview: Marcus sinks into darkness. Esme is on the run. Ben returns home. Ryan gets an unexpected visitor.

episodes.name: Should I Stay or Should I Go
episodes.overview: Marcus' family makes a tough decision. Esme and Ryan risk it all. Ben destroys someone he loves.

episodes.name: Before the Sirens
episodes.overview: Purge Night looms; Ryan and Esme put a plan into motion; Marcus readies for a showdown; Ben spirals.

episodes.name: Hail Mary
episodes.overview: As Purge Night rages on, Esme, Ryan, Marcus and Ben fight for their lives.

episodes.name: 7:01am
episodes.overview: As Purge Night rages on, Esme, Ryan, Marcus and Ben fight for their lives and their loved ones.
